Articles.Content:
Hey everyone!

I saw a game called "Space Station Simulator" the other day in this thread. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/27589-Lets-Discuss-Space-Games

I looked at it and it seemed fun and I gotta say it really is. If you enjoy managing the aspects of a Kerbal Space Program station but wish there was more to it such as... Building a custom crew, doing SCIENCE!!! Controling the atmosphere on the station, making sure your crew is healthy, this is for you. I'm curious though, does anyone else out there play? Willing to share their tips and tricks and secerts as I'm still learning to play.

Edited November 11, 2013 by 7499275
